about_the_game:
Dreams and Neuroscience! The ARPG "Lost Dream Chronicle" is Coming Soon!
By day, teach and nurture; by night, explore dreams.
experience the dual life of chemistry teacher & alchemist "Xiao Nan"!
With the psychoanalysis theory of the popular psychologist Freud, the game seamlessly combines campus life simulation with a 3D sandbox Metroidvania!
What you think about during the day shapes your dreams at night. Your actions in the real world during the day will have a major impact on the dream world at night!
Unveil mysteries, understand yourself, and save the world!

Teacher Simulator? Daytime Campus Life...

During the day in the game, live out a full day as a novice high school teacher, experiencing the hardships, growth, and joy unique to educators!

3D Metroidvania! Nighttime Alchemist Dream Adventures!

At night in the game, transform into an alchemist and enjoy exhilarating arcade-style light-gun shooting, combined with dodging, parrying, executions, and stealth actions to explore various uniquely styled dream worlds!

Dreams and Neuroscience, "What You Think About During the Day, You Dream About at Night"

Your choices and actions during the day will trigger positive or negative "neural memories," greatly affecting your character's attributes and altering the dream environment. Discover and utilize neural traits to continuously grow stronger!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphic board that works with OpenGL 4.4 or higher
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Core i5-8400 / Ryzen 5 1500X or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX1650 AMD Radeon™ RX570
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: "Lost Dream Chronicle" is a 3D ARPG that combines campus simulation with a 3D sandbox Metroidvania. The story follows a young adult, "Xiao Nan," who after graduating from university, enters society as a high school chemistry teacher, only to find herself trapped in dreams.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
